00018 #include <votca/tools/linalg.h>
00019 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix_proxy.hpp>
00020 #include "votca_config.h"

00022 #ifndef NOGSL
00023 #include <gsl/gsl_linalg.h>

00029 using namespace std;
00030 
00031 void linalg_qrsolve(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::matrix<double> &A, ub::vector<double> &b, ub::vector<double> *residual)
00032 {
00033 #ifdef NOGSL
00034     throw std::runtime_error("linalg_qrsolve is not compiled-in due to disabling of GSL - recompile Votca Tools with GSL support");
00035 #else
00036     // check matrix for zero column
00037     int nonzero_found = 0;
00038     for(size_t j=0; j<A.size2(); j++) {
00039         nonzero_found = 0;
00040         for(size_t i=0; i<A.size1(); i++) {
00041             if(fabs(A(i,j))>0) {
00042                 nonzero_found = 1;
00043             }
00044         }
00045         if(nonzero_found==0) {
00046             throw "qrsolve_zero_column_in_matrix";
00047         }
00048     }
00049 
00050     gsl_matrix_view m
00051         = gsl_matrix_view_array (&A(0,0), A.size1(), A.size2());
00052 
00053     gsl_vector_view gb
00054         = gsl_vector_view_array (&b(0), b.size());
00055 
00056     gsl_vector *gsl_x = gsl_vector_alloc (x.size());
00057     gsl_vector *tau = gsl_vector_alloc (x.size());
00058     gsl_vector *gsl_residual = gsl_vector_alloc (b.size());
00059 
00060     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&m.matrix, tau);
00061 
00062     gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve (&m.matrix, tau, &gb.vector, gsl_x, gsl_residual);
00063 
00064     for (size_t i =0 ; i < x.size(); i++)
00065         x(i) = gsl_vector_get(gsl_x, i);
00066 
00067     if(residual)
00068         for (size_t i =0 ; i < residual->size(); i++)
00069             (*residual)(i) = gsl_vector_get(gsl_residual, i);
00070 
00071     gsl_vector_free (gsl_x);
00072     gsl_vector_free (tau);
00073     gsl_vector_free (gsl_residual);
00074 #endif
00075 }
00076 
00077 void linalg_constrained_qrsolve(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::matrix<double> &A, ub::vector<double> &b, ub::matrix<double> &constr)
00078 {
00079 #ifdef NOGSL
00080     throw std::runtime_error("linalg_constrained_qrsolve is not compiled-in due to disabling of GSL - recompile Votca Tools with GSL support");
00081 #else
00082     // check matrix for zero column
00083     int nonzero_found = 0;
00084     for(size_t j=0; j<A.size2(); j++) {
00085         nonzero_found = 0;
00086         for(size_t i=0; i<A.size1(); i++) {
00087             if(fabs(A(i,j))>0) {
00088                 nonzero_found = 1;
00089             }
00090         }
00091         if(nonzero_found==0) {
00092             throw std::runtime_error("constrained_qrsolve_zero_column_in_matrix");
00093         }
00094     }
00095 
00096     // Transpose constr:
00097     constr = trans(constr);
00098 
00099     const int N = b.size();
00100     const int ngrid = x.size()/2;
00101 
00102     // temporary variables
00103     ub::matrix<double> Q(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);       // Q matrix: QR decomposition of trans(B)
00104     ub::matrix<double> Q_k(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00105     ub::identity_matrix<double> I (2*ngrid);
00106     ub::vector<double> v(2*ngrid);
00107 
00108     Q = ub::zero_matrix<double>(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00109     Q_k = ub::zero_matrix<double>(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00110     v = ub::zero_vector<double>(2*ngrid);
00111 
00112     double *tmp = & constr(0,0);
00113     gsl_matrix_view gsl_constr
00114       = gsl_matrix_view_array (tmp, constr.size1(), constr.size2());
00115 
00116     tmp = &b(0);
00117     gsl_vector_view gsl_b
00118          = gsl_vector_view_array (tmp, b.size());
00119 
00120 
00121     gsl_vector *tau_qr = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);
00122 
00123     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&gsl_constr.matrix, tau_qr);
00124 
00125     Q = I;
00126 
00127     for (int k = ngrid; k > 0 ; k--) {
00128 
00129         for (int icout = 0; icout < k - 1; icout++) {
00130              v(icout) = 0;
00131         }
00132         v(k - 1) = 1.0;
00133 
00134         for (int icout = k; icout < 2*ngrid; icout++) {
00135              v(icout) = gsl_matrix_get(&gsl_constr.matrix, icout, k - 1 );
00136         }
00137 
00138         Q_k = I - gsl_vector_get(tau_qr, k - 1 ) * outer_prod ( v, v );
00139         Q = prec_prod(Q, Q_k);
00140 
00141     }
00142 
00143     Q = trans(Q);
00144     gsl_vector_free (tau_qr);
00145 
00146     // Calculate A * Q and store the result in A
00147     A = prec_prod(A, Q);
00148 
00149 
00150     // A = [A1 A2], so A2 is just a block of A
00151     ub::matrix<double> A2 = ub::matrix_range<ub::matrix<double> >(A,
00152             ub::range (0, N), ub::range (ngrid, 2*ngrid)
00153          );
00154 
00155     tmp = &A2(0,0);
00156     gsl_matrix_view gsl_A2
00157          = gsl_matrix_view_array (tmp, A2.size1(), A2.size2());
00158    
00159         
00160     gsl_vector *z = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);
00161     gsl_vector *tau_solve = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);  // already done!
00162     gsl_vector *residual = gsl_vector_alloc (N);
00163 
00164     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&gsl_A2.matrix, tau_solve);
00165     gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve (&gsl_A2.matrix, tau_solve, &gsl_b.vector, z, residual);
00166 
00167     // Next two cycles assemble vector from y (which is zero-vector) and z
00168     // (which we just got by gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve)
00169 
00170     for (int i = 0; i < ngrid; i++ ) {
00171            x[i] = 0.0;
00172     }
00173 
00174     for (int i = ngrid; i < 2 * ngrid; i++ ) {
00175            x[i] = gsl_vector_get(z, i - ngrid);
00176     }
00177 
00178     // To get the final answer this vector should be multiplied by matrix Q
00179     // TODO: here i changed the sign, check again! (victor)
00180     x = -prec_prod( Q, x );
00181 
00182     gsl_vector_free (z);
00183     gsl_vector_free (tau_solve);
00184     gsl_vector_free (residual);
00185 #endif
00186 }
